name: Thundering Penance
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Keqing, equip this card.
After Keqing equips this card, immediately use Stellar Restoration once.
When your Keqing, who has this card equipped, creates an Electro Elemental Infusion, it will have the following effects:
Starting Duration (Rounds) +1, Electro DMG dealt by the attached character +1.
(You must have Keqing in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1403]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1403] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S14032]</color> once.
When your $[A1403], who has this card equipped, creates an <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C114032]</color>, it will have the following effects:
Starting $[K4] +1, $[K104] dealt by the attached character +1.
(You must have $[A1403] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Keqing</color>, equip this card.
After Keqing equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Stellar Restoration</color> once.
When your Keqing, who has this card equipped, creates an <color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro Elemental Infusion</color>, it will have the following effects:
Starting <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> +1, {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color> dealt by the attached character +1.
(You must have Keqing in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
storytext: As long as you're not actually cheating, this is just the name of a card.
source: Reward for inviting Keqing to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
